notes: follow your own crochet adventure with the 3 in 1 crochet handwarmers, which offer 3 unique designs all within one pattern. this free crochet pattern allows you to customize your project by choosing from three potential finishing options, including fingerless, with a removable top, or mittens. in this pattern you will work with a checkered fair isle design, which is super trendy, and fun to customize! the 3 in 1 handwarmers are made using the soft worsted weight yarn, red heart with love. red heart with love comes in a large variety of solid and variegated shades, making the color combination possibilities endless!
